name: Golf Assault v2018-02
description:
Generate a random field (easy and quick!), reach the tower shot by shot and destroy it.
Alone or multiplayer (who use less cannonballs win).
Extra "Challenge" mode: do your job within 60 seconds... think fast!

Last changes: Instead of game over (not in "Challenge" mode), 1 shoot penalty after 10 seconds, plus respawn  from the start when the cannonball goes out of bounds or in the water; 5 template fields.

***ITA***

Per giocare serve esclusivamente la versione 1.4.217 di Kodu, vedi
tito76.itch.io

AVVISO: se il cannone non è allineato premere 2 volte [Esc]/◄ per riniziare.
*********

To play you need exclusively the v1.4.217 of Kodu, see
tito76.itch.io

WARNING: If cannon isn't aligned press 2 times [Esc]/◄ to restart.
